stories.text:
Hi HN,

I am a founder (https://profilehunt.net/p/prithvi). I recently built and launched a job application tracker for helping people with job search. It has been a few months and I think this not a problem for a lot of people. Before I pivot to something else (a resume builder/ or a professional profile creator) I wanted to ask you what was/is your biggest pain point/ problem while searching for jobs recently.

Anything app/website solution that you wish had existed. Maybe either someone on HN or I could build something to help you with it.

Please state your experience level with your problem. It would help in creating a solution.

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Biggest pain point/problem in your job search recently?
